Noun: a visual representation (of an object or scene or person or abstractio)
language used in a figurative or nonliteral sense
someone who closely resembles a famous person (especially an acto)
the general impression that something (a person or organization or produc)
a representation of a person (especially in the form of sculptur)
Verb: render visible, as by means of MRI
imagine; conceive of; see in one's mind
